summary: Custom, Marriage Male and female NPC
descriptionHtml:
Custom companions, marriageable, found in the Bannered Mare, but if you cannot find the use this command- help *follower*, eg; help Jarraska
<br /><br />A box will appear saying *NPC: *numbers*
<br /><br />choose the last set of numbers labelled "Jarraska the Huntress"Â 
<br /><br />then copy the numbers to this code:
<br /><br />player.placeatme *numbers*
<br /><br />this will spawn the NPC in.
author: ToastedPlays
